body: If Junior is acting up after you told them to stop, what kind of punishment will REALLY make sure they never do it again?
body_html: If Junior is acting up after you told them to stop, what kind of punishment will REALLY make sure they never do it again?
title: Cruel Punishments For Misbehaving Kids?

body:
I believe its different for every child. You have to figure that out on an individual basis.

Ive seen kids laugh at spankings while just the threat of it is enough for another one. For some just sitting in time out is pure torture.  Obviously you dont want to scar them for life but you want it to be enough they get you're serious. Its a balancing act I suppose.
body_html:
I believe its different for every child. You have to figure that out on an individual basis.

Ive seen kids laugh at spankings while just the threat of it is enough for another one. For some just sitting in time out is pure torture. Obviously you dont want to scar them for life but you want it to be enough they get you're serious. Its a balancing act I suppose.

post.body: If Junior is acting up after you told them to stop, what kind of punishment will REALLY make sure they never do it again?
post.body_html: If Junior is acting up after you told them to stop, what kind of punishment will REALLY make sure they never do it again?
post.title: Cruel Punishments For Misbehaving Kids?

body:
> Obviously you dont want to scar them for life

the original intent of this post was to collect outlandish ideas of punishments that would hypothetically scar children for life (which could be absurd enough of suggestions that they would never even be done)

like I heard of one high school student caught with a can of chew who was made to eat it (a search online has one incident come up of someone who did it on a dare)
body_html:
Obviously you dont want to scar them for life

the original intent of this post was to collect outlandish ideas of punishments that would hypothetically scar children for life (which could be absurd enough of suggestions that they would never even be done)

post.title: Cruel Punishments For Misbehaving Kids?

body: Nothing will make sure that they NEVER do it again, the best you can do is impress upon them the consequences of their actions and put a consequence that they do not wish to repeat.
body_html: Nothing will make sure that they NEVER do it again, the best you can do is impress upon them the consequences of their actions and put a consequence that they do not wish to repeat.

author.bio:

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: Today is punishment day! First punishment: Taking a really really hot shower! Next punishment: Listening to really loud music! Next punishment: Pooping on you! Next Punishment: Homework! Next punishment: Beating the shit out of you! Next punishment: Lighting you on fire! Next punishment: Destroying everything you own! And now, for your final punishment: Death by Sarlacc!
body_html: Today is punishment day! First punishment: Taking a really really hot shower! Next punishment: Listening to really loud music! Next punishment: Pooping on you! Next Punishment: Homework! body:
Build a padded white room, play white noise, feed them only white rice and milk through a slot, and provide blank paper and white crayons to transcribe a dictionary printed in white ink. Don’t let them out until they get through the letter A.

That will teach them.
body_html:
Build a padded white room, play white noise, feed them only white rice and milk through a slot, and provide blank paper and white crayons to transcribe a dictionary printed in white ink. Don’t let them out until they get through the letter A.

That will teach them.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

Ask and answer questions.

parent.body:
Build a padded white room, play white noise, feed them only white rice and milk through a slot, and provide blank paper and white crayons to transcribe a dictionary printed in white ink. Don’t let them out until they get through the letter A.

That will teach them.

That will teach them.

post.body: If Junior is acting up after you told them to stop, what kind of punishment will REALLY make sure they never do it again?
post.body_html: If Junior is acting up after you told them to stop, what kind of punishment will REALLY make sure they never do it again?
post.title: Cruel Punishments For Misbehaving Kids?
